cyclone.name: ARLENE
cyclone.current_location: about 305 miles WNW of Ft. Myers, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: Expected to drift WNW briefly, then turn south on Friday and accelerate southward toward the central Gulf, staying well offshore of Florida
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: None – system projected to remain over open Gulf waters

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Central Gulf of Mexico waters; no direct Florida west-coast impact expected
weather_observation.wind: Occasional gusty winds; sustained tropical-storm-force winds unlikely
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected along the Manatee County coastline
weather_observation.rainfall: 1–3 inches of rain possible through Saturday with isolated higher pockets
weather_observation.other_hazards: Isolated flash or urban flooding in poorly drained areas during heavier showers
